messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Nacirema Tribe
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/21/2004 7:48:19 PM Eastern Daylight Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: ever since i was first exposed to the nacirema
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/21/2004 7:48:19 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

ever since i was first exposed to the nacirema tribe when i was in high
school, i've been fascinated by their rituals -- which incidentally include running
tiny string between their teeth.
*************Ahhh... One of the very few things I learned about in school
that was interesting.
Imagine the later in the class disappointment...

Elissa Jill

Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you;
They're supposed to help you discover who you are.
~Bernice Johnson Reagon
